summary: This is a warranty deed transferring a property in Bradford, New Hampshire, from a trustee of a trust dated December 28, 2012, to Granite Reality, LLC. The document certifies the trustee's authority to convey the real estate interest.

persons.name: Trustee of The u/d/t dated December 28, 2012
persons.context: The individual acting as trustee for a trust established on December 28, 2012, who is conveying a property to Granite Reality, LLC.

events.title: Property Transfer to Granite Reality, LLC
events.description: A warranty deed is executed, transferring a tract of land with buildings in Bradford, New Hampshire, from a trustee to Granite Reality, LLC.
personsInvolved: Trustee of The u/d/t dated December 28, 2012

events.title: Prior Property Acquisition by Trust
events.description: The trust (via its trustee) previously acquired the same land and premises by a warranty deed recorded on December 14, 2017.
personsInvolved: Trustee of The u/d/t dated December 28, 2012

events.title: Trust Establishment
events.description: The trust agreement under which the trustee is acting was dated and established.
personsInvolved: Trustee of The u/d/t dated December 28, 2012

locations: Town of Bradford, County of Merrimack, State of New Hampshire
keyFacts: A property in Bradford, New Hampshire, was transferred from a trustee of a trust (u/d/t dated December 28, 2012) to Granite Reality, LLC in December 2019.
The trust had originally acquired the property via a warranty deed dated December 14, 2017.
The document includes a certificate under RSA 564-A:7, affirming the trustee's full power to convey real estate interests without requiring third-party inquiry into the power's exercise.
The grantee, Granite Reality, LLC, is a New Hampshire limited liability company with a principal mailing address in Boston, Massachusetts.
The property is explicitly stated as 'not homestead premises'.
